title: Musical Note Recognition
description: Identify musical notes in standard notation. Valid notes are the letters A through G, optionally followed by a sharp (#) or flat (b) symbol.
solutionSummary: This pattern matches musical notes using a character class `[A-G]` for the note letters, followed by an optional sharp or flat symbol `[#b]?`. The `?` quantifier makes the accidental optional, allowing for both natural notes (A, B, C) and accidentals (A#, Bb).
